Document:
#Waffles and Pancakes
[color=#a4885c]Pancake[/color]
- 5u flour - 5u milk - 1 egg
- Add a chocolate bar to make a [color=#a4885c]Chocolate-Chip Pancake[/color]! - Pancakes can be stacked together!
[color=#a4885c]Waffle[/color]
- 5u flour - 5u milk (or soy milk)
- 1 egg - 5u soda water
# Cookies
[color=#a4885c]Cookie[/color]
- 5u flour - 5u sugar
- Stick of butter - Chocolate bar
[color=#a4885c]Sugar Cookie[/color]
- 5u flour - 10u sugar - Stick of butter
[color=#a4885c]Raisin Cookie[/color]
- 5u flour - 5u sugar - Raisins
[color=#a4885c]Oatmeal Cookie[/color]
- 5u oatmeal - 5u sugar - Stick of butter
# Pies - All pies require a [color=#a4885c]pie tin[/color] along with the other ingredients in the microwave! The tin is retrieved when the pie is eaten, [color=#fcdf03]but when the pie is thrown, the tin is lost[/color]. - All pies are made with [color=#a4885c]pie dough[/color]. - Some pies can be sliced.
[color=#a4885c]Pie Dough[/color]
- 15u flour - 2 eggs - 5u salt
[color=#a4885c]Apple Pie[/color]
- Pie dough - 3x apple
- Analogically, other pies are made by using three pieces of a different ingredient [color=#888084](examine to learn more about them)[/color]!
[color=#a4885c]Amanita Pie[/color]
- Pie dough - 1 Fly Amanita
#Others
[color=#a4885c]Cheesecake Balls[/color]
- 5u sugar - 5u flour - Curd Cheese
[color=#a4885c]Mothmallow[/color]
- 10u sugar - 5u rum
- 5u soymilk - Soy Beans
[color=#a4885c]Moffin[/color]
- 5u flour - 5u milk
- Egg - Cloth
